Resistances.string: and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons

MonsterTrait.Name: Stone Camouflage
MonsterTrait.Text: The grick has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The grick makes two attacks: one with its tail and one with its tentacles. If it hits with its tentacles, the grick can make one beak attack against the same target.

MonsterAction.Name: Tail
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Tentacles
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (4d8 + 4) slashing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Beak
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage.
